body:
Resend a PR after #2967 being closed unexpectedly by me. 

Replace CUDA installer URLs in spec files.

According to checksums in the original spec file, it targets for Linux `x86_64` platforms only. Platforms like macosx, ppc, windows are not handled. This commit doesen't intend to solve the platform-dependent issue.
title: Retrive CUDA installers from Internet.
